titles.title: Federal Disaster Housing Stability Act of 2020
Federal Disaster Housing Stability Act of 2020
Federal Disaster Housing Stability Act of 2020
To provide for a moratorium on evictions from and foreclosures on residences during a major disaster or emergency, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
